refnamediv.refpurpose: Calls dpois function defined on R which takes x(the vector of values at which the function value is to be found) and lambda(the mean value) as input parameters and the result is the probability value of x computed based on poisson distribution formula

listitem.para: x : vector of values at which poisson distribution is needed

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function calls the dpois() function in R that takes x ,its size and lambda as the input arguments and returns the probability value (computed based on poisson distribution formula) for the x passed as input.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: // dpois on x and lambda y = dpois(2,[2,3],4)

simplelist.member: Mohana N (Assistant Professor, SAS, Division of Mathematics, VIT Chennai)
